name: Duckfight
description:
"We should've seen this coming. While we were all caught up in politics and foreign affairs, the ducks militarized right under our noses. There's no hope for humanity. The only order I have left for you is to give your jet one hell of a final ride. It's been a pleasure, soldier."

- Air Force guy

In this endless "flyer", shoot and dodge rampant waves of ducks in a final act of defiance to the new superior race. Your aircraft is built with 4 turbo engines that randomly take damage whenever a duck collides with it. Step out of the cockpit every once in a while to repair them but take caution, as your autopilot can only take the controls for so long...

[NOTE] This game was made for the "PILOT" themed game jam (week 161).

ENJOY & LEAVE FEEDBACK :) I had a blast making this game and I look forward to seeing what you score!
